content: and can program in several languages. He has a degree in Computing Technology from UNICAMP. Preface 5 With gratitude The authors of this book extend our thanks to the following people for their contributions and assistance: Ivan Dobos Christian Ehrhardt Frank Heimes Canonical, Inc. Chris Mackowski Jan Stodola Dan Horak Red Hat, Inc. Mike Friesenegger Ihno Krumreich Mark Post, Terry Smith, Donald Vosberg Special thanks A special thank you to Robert Haimowitz, IBM Garage™ for Systems. Without Bob, these books would not be possible.
